body_html: Feed_dict does a single-threaded memcpy of contents from Python runtime into TensorFlow runtime. If data is needed on GPU, then you'll have an additional CPU->GPU transfer. I'm used to seeing up to 10x improvement in performance when switching from feed_dict to native TensorFlow (Variable/Queue)
